gpu_set_zfunc: This function can be used to set the z-buffer testing comparison mode (see gpu_set_ztestenable() for more information). The values available for use are any of the following constants (the default value is cmpfunc_lessequal):
The comparison mode to use (see list above)
The above code switches on z-buffer testing and sets its comparison mode before drawing a background sprite and then switches it back off again to continue drawing.
